sentences.en: Are you the culprit who broke this window?
sentences.cn: 你就是那个打破窗户的人 吗 ?

sentences.en: He gave the name of the chief culprit.
He knows the culprit but is not letting on.
sentences.cn: 他知道罪犯是谁，但却闭口不说。

sentences.en: It is clear from these data that coal is the main culprit.
sentences.cn: 从这些数据可以清楚地看出,煤是主要的祸根.

sentences.en: It is generally thought that salt is a culprit in this disease.
sentences.cn: 一般认为食盐是这种病的病因.

sentences.en: Police finally managed to catch the culprit.
Someone broke a cup: who was the culprit?
sentences.cn: 有人把杯子打碎了,是谁干的?

sentences.en: The culprit is still at large.
The culprit was seated in a wooden chair.
The culprit will be whipped when he is found.
sentences.cn: 那个罪犯被找到后就要挨鞭子.

sentences.en: The eustachian tube, leading from the middle ear to Joe's throat, is the culprit.
sentences.cn: 由乔的中耳通往他的咽喉的耳咽管是肇事者.

sentences.en: The police are now on the scent of the culprit.
The police followed home the clue and finally caught the culprit.
sentences.cn: 警察根据线索追根到底,终于抓住了这个罪犯.

sentences.en: The police put the culprit in jail.
They assured him that the culprit would come back again indeed.
sentences.cn: 他们也劝他相信,那个罪犯一定会回来的.

sentences.en: They surprised the culprit into telling the truth.
sentences.cn: 他们用出其不意的办法使罪犯吐露实情.

trans.tran_cn: 犯人，罪犯，肇事者，被告人
trans.tran_en: the person who is guilty of a crime or doing something wrong
